Barcelona are considering signing Ajax star Mohammed Kudus before the summer transfer window ends

Football Emily · 25/08/2023 · Barcelona

﻿According to a recent report from Fichajes, Barcelona is considering a summer move for Ajax star Mohammed Kudus. According to reports, the Catalan club wants to sign the Ghanaian international before the summer transfer window closes.
